channel.title: Py Humble Software
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Software bundles!

item.title: The Unreal Engine Space & Sci-Fi Mastery Kit: Assets, Tutorials & More!
item.description: Unreal assets on a cosmic scale
item.content:encoded: Bring the majesty of the cosmos to your Unreal Engine project with Arghanion’s Puzzle Box! This bundle of stunning assets will help you implement all manner of awe-inspiring outer space phenomena into your project. At your disposal are the tools to craft rich asteroid fields and mesmerizing nebulas, generate space stations, planets, and colossal Dyson spheres, and even ready-to-use Unreal Engine blueprints to build functioning space ships. Pay what you want for this galactic treasure trove and help support Code.org with your purchase!

item.title: CZEPEKU's Multiversal Maps & Scenes for Alchemy VTT
item.description: Set the mood with awesome maps
item.content:encoded: Stock up on high-quality virtual tabletop assets for your RPG campaign with this bundle from beloved map creators CZEPEKU! From lush mangrove wilds teeming with life and danger, to thrumming city marketplaces, this collection of over 20 maps will help you set the stage for countless memorable adventures. Alongside the maps, you’ll also get Scenes, which are cinematic vignettes handcrafted by CZEPEKU to help you set the stage for your adventures. Pay what you want for this bundle of gorgeous game aids and help support One Tree Planted!

item.title: The Ultimate Testing Bundle
item.content:encoded: Level-up your understanding of cybersecurity and software testing with this bundle of video courses, covering a spectrum of critical skills in today’s IT landscape. Learn to test the security of websites and web applications using the same tools and techniques as the black hat hackers you’re trying to ward off. Achieve mastery of Selenium, the powerful open source set of tools and libraries that lets you automate critical browser tasks for testing web apps and enhancing efficiency and accuracy in your dev process. Get up to speed with testing WiFi security, REST APIs, Ruby, and much more! Pay what you want for this bundle of cutting edge instruction, and help support charity with your purchase.

item.title: Unity RPG Beginners Collection
item.description: Craft your dream RPG with Unity
item.content:encoded: Bring your RPG vision to life with this bundle of video courses from Zenva, conceived from the ground up for Unity beginners! Offering hours of instruction in addition to source code that you can adapt, you’ll learn critical skills via hands-on practice that’ll enable you to create 2D action RPGs, 3D turn-based RPGs, mouse-only micro-RPGs, and much more. Also included are courses covering topics invaluable to RPG development, like procedural terrain generation and Unity debugging fundamentals. There’s even a course on how to harness Dall-E to create NPC portraits for your game! Get started on your dream project today, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: VEGAS Pro Creative Frontier Bundle
item.content:encoded: Upgrade your video and audio creation capabilities with this comprehensive content creator’s toolkit, packed with world-class software and assets to make your output soar. VEGAS Pro 19 Edit is a comprehensive video editing software package that’s easy to learn, and includes sophisticated compositing features as well as integrated audio and effects. You’ll also get Sound Forge Pro 15, a powerhouse audio editing suite with extensive plugin support, designed to deliver flawless masters. You’ll also get the easy-to-use Magix Music Maker 2022 as well as a boatload of loops, instruments, effects, and more! Pay what you want for this content creator’s treasure trove and help support Save the Children!

item.title: The Ultimate Game Development Bundle
item.content:encoded: Open the door to a dizzying universe of game development possibilities with this bundle of Unreal Engine and Unity assets. You’ll get a vast trove of ready-to-use game assets for the two most popular game engines in the world—everything from gritty cyberpunk sets and serene seaside vistas, to weapons from across history, high quality icons for your UI, and stunning special effects. Also included in the bundle are a host of tutorials to broaden your skillset, as well as handy plugins that you can quickly add to your workflow. Pay what you want for this vast toolbox of assets valued at over $3,000 and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Learn to Create Game Art in Blender Bundle 2023
item.content:encoded: Learn Blender with the help of the creators at GameDev.tv! This comprehensive bundle features everything you need to get started or level up your skills with the free, open-source 3D art software. Learn about animation, rigging, modeling, environmental art, and more with GameDev.tv’s courses. Pick up Alpha Brush Packs and materials to help carve out details in your creations. Get a complete kit for your Blender learning journey, and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!
